description: Kuki ari ngombwa kuganira no kungurana ibitekerezo ku bijyanyen’isuku n’isukura?
title: Kuki ari ngombwa kuganira no kungurana ibitekerezo ku bijyanyen’isuku n’isukura?
content:
Indwara nyinshi z’impiswi zikomoka ku mwanda uterwa no gukoresha amazi mabi
cyangwa isuku nke. Byagaragaye ko izi ndwara zibasira cyane cyane abana ku buryo 
ku isi ku bantu 100 bahitanwa n’indwara z’impiswi 90% baba ari abana bari munsi 
y’imyaka itanu.
Nyamara ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko umuco wo gukaraba intoki n’amazi meza
n’isabune ushobora kugabanya izo ndwara kugera kuri 50%. Gukaraba neza intoki 
kandi bigabanya kwandura indwara z’ubuhumekero nk’umusonga n’izindi, ndetse 
n’indwara z’amaso nk’ishaza.

Niyo mpamvu ababyeyi n’abandi barera abana bagomba kujya bakaraba intoki: (1)
igihe bamaze guhanagura umwana witumye (2) igihe bavuye kwituma (3) mbere 
yo gutegura amafunguro, konsa umwana no kumugaburira na (4) nyuma yo gukora 
mu myanda.

Bagomba kandi gushishikariza abana gukaraba intoki n’amazi meza n’isabune 
mbere yo kurya, na nyuma yo kwituma. Umwanda wo mu rugo, uw’amatungo 
n’inyamaswa zo mu rugo ugomba gutabwa kure y’urugo, kure y’inzira, kure 
y’imigezi cyangwa ahandi abana bakinira.

Ni ngombwa gukoresha imisarane isukuye, no kwibuka gukaraba intoki n’amazi
meza n’isabune mu rwego rwo kwirinda indwara ziterwa n’umwanda. Ibi birinda 
abana bigafasha n’imiryango yabo kudatakaza amafaranga, no kubahiriza uburen-
ganzira bw’abana ku buzima.

Buri muryango ugomba kugira umusarane ute isuku n’amahame y’isuku n’isukura 
akubahirizwa mu gihe cyo kuwukoresha.
